Package com.amazon.insights

Amazon Insights SDK

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ABTestClient ABTestClient is the entry point into the Amazon Insights SDK where variations are retrieved for projects.
Event Represents the visit or conversion event of an A/B test, or may also be used to collect useful information in your application.
EventClient EventClient is the entry point into the Amazon Insights SDK where Event objects are created, recorded, and submitted to the Amazon Insights Website.
InsightsCredentials The InsightsCredentials interface is implemented by all classes that can provide identification of the application and keys for signing/encrypting data within the SDK.
InsightsHandler<T> InsightsHandler is a handle to any asynchronous long-running operation, such as ABTestClient.getVariations(String...), which allows you to assign a callback that is notified on completion (whether successful or not) of the operation.
InsightsOptions The InsightsOptions interface is implemented by all classes that can provide options such as enablement of event collection and allowance of event delivery on WAN within the SDK.
SessionClient SessionClient is the entry point into the Amazon Insights SDK where sessions can be paused or resumed.
UserProfile UserProfile is used to define dimensions (or characteristics) about the current user.
Variation A Variation that was allocated for a project.
VariationSet A collection of Variation objects that have been allocated for the current user.
 

Class Summary
AmazonInsights AmazonInsights is the entry point of the SDK.
InsightsCallback<T> The InsightsCallback is the callback object that you can set on an InsightsHandler via InsightsHandler.setCallback(InsightsCallback) to react upon success or failure of the associated asynchronous method.
 

Package com.amazon.insights Description

Amazon Insights SDK

The Amazon Insights SDK allows a developer to request variations and record events. The SDK requires the following AndroidManifest.xml permissions: 

     <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
     <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE"/>
If upgrading from Version 1 of the SDK, remove the InsightsProcessingService from the AndroidManifest.xml 
     <service android:name="com.amazon.insights.InsightsProcessingService"/>


To create an instance of the SDK, refer to AmazonInsights.
To request treatments for an AB Test, refer to ABTestClient.
To create and record events, refer to EventClient.
To manage sessions, refer to SessionClient.
To record Monetization Purchase events, refer to the Monetization Builders.
To update a UserProfile for use with Segmentation refer to UserProfile.
